name: Lamb Sheep Farmer
description:
The World became a giant Junkyard with only 2 survivors, a farmer, and his bird.

Together they are trying to find fertile ground, survivors and a home

Controls:

WASD - Move

SPACE - JUMP / DOUBLE JUMP

E - Pick Up / Grab

SPACE - Climb Wall

This "game" is still in development and is expected to grow into a very good platformer.

Made by 1 Person

Semesterproject for :

Supervised by: Sebastian Stamm
